name: Giant vs Horde: Battle a real human without limits!
blurb: Pilot your fighter to take down the most dangerous game: a giant human who can move however\nthey wish in a motion capture suit!

rewards.reward: |--VR and Motion Gaming Supporter--| Be a part of VR gaming history. Your name will be listed in the special thanks section of our website and in the game itself.

|--------------Season Pass--------------| Fight in the Horde against the Giant in all 12 events of the first season. Each event includes warm up rounds, opening Giants matches, and our headlining Giant.

|-----------------Early Bird!----------------|  |--------------Beta Access--------------| Thanks for being an early supporter! You get access to 6 bonus pre-season events before Season Pass holders.  Digital download of the game soundtrack. Access to our private community + Season Pass
|--------------Beta Access--------------| Access to 6 bonus pre-season events before Season Pass holders. Digital download of the game soundtrack. Access to our private community + Season Pass

|-----------------Early Bird!----------------|  |-------------Instant Access-------------| Get access to the game a few short weeks after the Kickstarter ends. We are still in the early alpha stage, but we need people to play-test with us. You will be invited to private battles and post-game Google Hangout sessions to give feedback and participate in the development of the game. Includes Game Soundtrack + All pre-season events + Access to our private community + Season Pass

|-------------Instant Access-------------| Get access to the game a few short weeks after the Kickstarter ends. We are still in the early alpha stage, but we need people to play-test with us. You will be invited to private battles and post-game Google Hangout sessions to give feedback and participate in the development of the game. Includes Game Soundtrack + All pre-season events + Access to our private community + Season Pass

|--------Special Edition + Avatar--------| Stand out in the horde with a special ship and avatar limited to our Kickstarter backers. Instant Access  + Game Soundtrack + All pre-season events + Access to our private community + Season Pass

|-----The VIP T-Shirt Experience-----| Get a special, Kickstarter exclusive Giant vs Horde T-Shirt. When wearing this shirt you will receive VIP treatment from us. This Includes: Special line access for our demos at conferences/conventions, Invitations to our private parties/event and a high-five and thank you WHENEVER we see you. Includes Special Edition Ship and Avatar + Instant Access + All pre-season events + Game Soundtrack + Access to our private community + Season Pass.

|------------3D Printed Model-----------| Get a 3D printed model of your special Kickstarter edition ship! Includes VIP T-Shirt Experience + Instant Access + All pre-season events + Game Soundtrack + Access to our private community +  Season Pass.

|---------------Custom ship--------------| You will get a custom ship made just for you. You will be the only person in the game with this fancy ship, and you will get a 3D printed version of it  (Replaces previous level's 3D model). Includes VIP T-Shirt Experience + Instant Access + All pre-season events  + Game Soundtrack + Access to our private community +  Season Pass.

|--------------Custom avatar-------------| You will get a custom made avatar for your character. You will be truly unique among the horde. Includes Custom 3D printed ship + VIP T-Shirt Experience + Instant Access + All pre-season events + Game Soundtrack + Access to our private community + Season Pass.

|-----------Backstage Access----------| Be one of the few who get to see how the sausage is made. Come by, meet the team, and play as the giant in a pre-season match. Includes all previous levels. (Travel not included)

|-------------Official Match--------------| Do you have what it takes to defeat the Horde in battle? Either at a convention or in our studio, you will play as the giant in an official match against the Horde! Includes all previous levels. (Travel not included)

|---------------Bonus Event-------------| Through your generous support we are able to add an additional event to our season for everyone to enjoy! You can headline the event, or recommend who you want and we will try to get them! Your friends will also be able to play as the giant in the warm-up matches! Includes all previous tiers.

|---------------Private Event-------------| We will bring the Giant vs Horde experience to you for a private event! This is great for corporate parties, LAN parties, and conventions. Does not include travel expenses. Includes all previous levels.
